answers.answer: Any changes to your medications or oral hygiene habits?

question: have saliva even if I dont drink water for hours but my mouth feels dry?!!!I have a problem with ocd in every health issue about a months ago I had dry mouth for few days then it went away then after a week back again like on and off .. so I started freaking out reading about it over the Internet .. I dont have diabetes .. but im started to freak out that it might be chronic! .. my family say becuz im over thinking it never goes away .. I have saliva but my mouth feel dry!
title: dry mouth driving me crazy!
